cookie_description: We dey use cookie to make your experience better. You fit customize your choices for down.
essential_desc: E dey necessary for website to work. You no fit disable am.
analytics_desc: E dey help us understand how you dey use our app to improve am.
marketing_desc: We dey use am to show you relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness.
age_verification_desc: You must dey at least {{age}} years old to use this app.
confirm_age: I don reach {{age}} years or more
age_requirement: You must dey at least {{age}} years old to access this content.
coppa_notice: We dey follow COPPA rules to protect children privacy online.
breach_support: If you get questions, contact our support team.
health_disclaimer_1: This app dey provide general fitness information and e no be replacement for professional medical advice.
health_disclaimer_2: Always talk to qualified doctor before you start any exercise program or change your diet.
health_disclaimer_3: If you feel pain or dizziness during exercise, stop immediately and find medical help.
disclaimer_checkbox: I understand say this app no dey give medical advice and I go consult doctor before I make health decisions.
consult_professional: For medical emergency, contact emergency services immediately.
